name: Geminark: Under The Shadow
description: Wretch, an anthropomorphic creature, work as a janitor and keeper within the spaceship known as Geminark. What would have been a typical  day for Wretch, would end up being the worst day of his life. Geminark would end being overrun by all the alien creatures that the ship was carrying. With the entire ship falling apart, Wretch must now survive against the galaxy's deadliest monsters. Will Wretch save the ship and its crew-mates? Will he find a way to get out of this madness? Will he be able to get his last paycheck?
